name: Forgotten Catacombs
description: Ancient burial halls haunted by restless dead and cloying darkness.

room_templates.name: Ossuary Gallery
room_templates.description: Stacks of skulls line the walls while candles gutter in stagnant air.

room_templates.name: Sunken Crypt
room_templates.description: Flooded alcoves conceal sarcophagi beneath murky water.

room_templates.name: Chapel of Whispers
room_templates.description: Faint chanting emanates from statues whose mouths have been sewn shut.
